q: Crown Prosecution Service( CPS) has asked a senior QC to "comprehensively" re-examine material amassed as part of the original inquiry and any new evidence. In his resignation statement, Mr Andy Coulson said: Nothing is more important than the Government's task of getting this country back on its feet. "Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. "I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on. Speaking to reporters later, Mr David Cameron said he had done an "excellent, excellent job" as his communications chief, and was being "punished for the same offence twice" following his earlier resignation

Waarom is Eric Schmidt opgestapt als topman van Google? Eric Schmidt zegt er zelf niets over, behalve dat hij de inmiddels beroemde tweet verstuurde: Dagelijks ouderlijk toezicht niet meer nodig! We weten maar bitter weinig over het vertrek van Eric Schmidt . De machtswisseling in Mountain View voedt de geruchten dat Eric Schmidt zich opmaakt voor een baan binnen de regering van Barack Obama of dat hij door Google geslachtofferd wordt
